Yasuo.Title: The unforgiven
Yasuo.Description: An Ionian of deep resolve, Yasuo is an agile swordsman who wields the air itself against his enemies. He excels at mid-range, using the power of the wind to dash through opponents and block projectiles.

Ahri.Title: The nine-tailed fox
Ahri.Description: Ahri is a fox-like vastaya who can manipulate her prey's emotions and consume their essence. She's a highly mobile mage with tons of pressure tools at her disposal.

Darius.Title: The hand of Noxus
Darius.Description: Rising from humble origins to become a bringer of true carnage, Darius cleaves through the empire's enemies. He's a mid-range fighter with attacks just as brutal and deadly as his axe.

Ekko.Title: The boy who shattered the time
Ekko.Description: A prodigy from the rough streets of Zaun, Ekko manipulates time to twist any situation to his advantage. Using his own invention, the Z-Drive, he thrives in pressure mixups and burst mobility.

Illaoi.Title: The krakken priestess
Illaoi.Description: The Truth-Bearer of Nagakabouros, Illaoi wields a massive totem to test the will of her enemies and summon spectral tentacles to fight by her side. She's a high-damage lockdown bruiser who overwhelms enemies with pressure as immense as her faith.

Braum.Title: The heart of Freljord
Braum.Description: Braum roams the frostbitten wilds of the Freljord, lending his shield to those in need. He deploys a wide range of defensive utility, massive close-range attacks, and a small army of poros to protect his allies and freeze his enemies in their tracks.
